Posts.Content: thanks for the replies.  I appreciate your insight.  jtm
Posts.Title: After the biopsies

Posts.Content: A big thank you to everyone.  I got the results today and it's not cancer.  I am relieved and very grateful that you are all out there.  Thanks again, jtm
Posts.Title: Thank you to everyone

Posts.Content: I had the biopsies on Thursday and it's Monday and the wait is awful.  I will be much better once I know what's going on for sure.  It's a comfort to know that you are all out there.  jtm
Posts.Title: the wait is awful

Posts.Content: thanks, I appreciate the replies. sanjoserealtor
Posts.Title: After the biopsies

Posts.Content: Hello, Yesterday I had biopsies in both breasts. While the radiologist made a point to say that the left (calcification) looked fine, he said that the right looked very suspicious and went on to tell me that there were "great therapy options" now. That made me very nervous and I'm expecting bad news. So, what's next? You are all so much more knowledgable than I. Thanks,
Posts.Title: Diagnosed today - advice needed
